author: civanch
body:
Some re-design of classes defining CustomParticles is done. It become possible to perform exotic simulation in MT mode. 

Extra python fragment Exotica_MT_SIM_cfi.py may be recommended for exotica simulation instead of old Exotica_HSCP_SIM_cfi.py

Code clean-up include implementing of naming convention for header files and one obsolete class is removed.
title: General clean-up of the SimG4Core/CustomPhysics library
